input.value: Data Analytics, Business Intelligence, BI Developer, BI, SQL Developer, SSIS, SSAS, SSRS, Machine Learning, Data Lake Analytics, Stream, BI Stack, Cube, Microsoft, SQL Server, Tableau, Qlik, PowerBI,

div.div: Data Analytics, Business Intelligence, BI Developer, BI, SQL Developer, SSIS, SSAS, SSRS, Machine Learning, Data Lake Analytics, Stream, BI Stack, Cube, Microsoft, SQL Server, Tableau, Qlik, PowerBI,

div.p: SWC Technology Partners is searching for full-time developers who have the skills to participate in all aspects of a Data Analytics development lifecycle using Microsoft Business Intelligence (BI) technologies. This position will be working closely with our clients to provide outstanding customized data analytics solutions. This role is exposed to a wide range of technologies, roles, and client environments. This position will report to the Data Analytics Practice Lead.

ul.li: Interact with customers and project leaders to define and document project specifications
Design, develop, test, and implement applications
Participate in support activities for existing software
Partake in technology training to learn various Data Analytics / Business Intelligence technologies
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or a related field
Minimum of 1 - 5 years of software development experience using Microsoft technologies
Strong SQL Server skills is a must along with SQL queries and stored procedures
Excellent organizational and time management skills
Strong written and verbal communication skills
Candidate must be willing to train in BI technologies utilizing deep database skills to participate in business intelligence projects
Experience with the following technologies, although not required, is desired:
Semantic Models
Integration Services (SSIS)
Analysis Services (SSAS – Multidimensional and Tabular cubes)
Reporting Services (SSRS)
Machine Learning
Stream Analytics or Data Lake Analytics
Microsoft Azure SQL or SQL Data Warehouse
Azure Data Factory
PowerBI or Tableau
Amazon Web Services (AWS) with Redshift
Must be local to Chicagoland and open to local travel to client sites, if needed
Must have legal authorization to work in the U.S. for any employee
Bragging rights – Check out our Awards!
Career development – formal mentorship programs with assigned career advocate to assist with your training and growth
Comprehensive health and dental plans starting on Day One
SWC pays for technical certifications
Flex time schedule
Free onsite gym, quarterly massages, yoga classes and fun group competitions and outings!

div.p: SWC is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, gender transition, religion, national origin, marital status, age, disability, veteran status, genetic information, or any other protected status.

Keywords: Data Analytics, Business Intelligence, BI Developer, BI, SQL Developer, SSIS, SSAS, SSRS, Machine Learning, Data Lake Analytics, Stream, BI Stack, Cube, Microsoft, SQL Server, Tableau, Qlik, PowerBI, Machine Learning, Azure Data Factory, RedShift
